intro: Mulgedium thianschanicum, commonly known as the Tian Shan mulgedium, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, commonly known as the buckwheat family. The plant is characterized by its upright stems and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. It typically grows in rocky or gravelly soils at high altitudes. Mulgedium thianschanicum is of interest to botanists due to its unique adaptations to alpine environments.
